nodes.text: Tom Hardy (born September 15, 1977) is an English actor and producer best known in his roles in action films.

Hardy appeared in a cameo role in Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi (2017) as the stormtrooper 926 who finds Finn during his infiltration into the Supremacy during the attack on the Resistance fleet only to congratulate him for his apparent promotion. His scene, however, was deleted by director Rian Johnson for reasons unknown from the final cut of the film. The cut material is available in a deleted scene on the 2018 Blu-ray release of the film.
